attributes.action: oppose the closure of Victoria Leisure Centre in Nottingham and insist that Nottingham City Council maintain and improve the Centre’s existing facilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nottingham City Council announced their proposal to close Victoria Leisure Centre in Nottingham on Friday 8 February. They plan to make a final decision about its fate on Tuesday 18 March 2008. This gives us just over a month to get as many people as possible to sign this petition.

For more information on the Save Victoria Baths campaign please visit the campaign website:

www.savevictoriabaths.org.uk

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "oppose the closure of Victoria Leisure Centre in Nottingham and insist that Nottingham City Council maintain and improve the Centre’s existing facilities."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15487.asp

Prime Minister's Office
